name: test2.2.4.1ECAwTrainingExp
title: 2.2.4.1 EC Awareness Training Expires + WebAppNotification Testing

operations.comment: Change the EUID to have a deterministic test.
Validate the user is created in IDV
Disable the Service Driver so we can setup each precondition.
Validate the IDV mod (Having odd timing tests right no so being very thorough).
Set the dates for the date calculation testing.
Validate the the user is updated appropriately.
Re-enable the Service Driver to ready the users for the IDM Job
Set the date attributes for testing
Validate the correct updates are made
